Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.controller

Class StudentLoginController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.StudentLoginController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Initializable
public class StudentLoginController extends Object implements Initializable
Controller class for handling student login functionality. Manages the login interface and authentication for students.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller. Required by JavaFX but currently not used.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object
      resources - The resources used to localize the root object

    • switchRegister

      public void switchRegister()
      Switches to the student registration UI.

    • switchLogin

      public void switchLogin()
      Switches back to the student login UI.

    • login

      public void login()
      Handles the login action when the login button is clicked. Verifies student credentials and manages the login process. If successful, switches to the student's main UI. If unsuccessful, displays an error message and clears the password field.

    • register

      public void register()
      Handles the registration action when the register button is clicked. Attempts to register a new student with the provided information. Displays appropriate error messages for validation failures.
